package.name: staubli_tx60_gazebo

description.p: ROS-Industrial Gazebo support package for the Staubli TX60 (and variants).
This package contains the configuration data and launch files required to simulate the Staubli TX60 and the Staubli TX60L manipulator in Gazebo.
Before using any of the configuration files included in this package, be sure to check they are correct for the particular robot model and configuration you intend to use them with.

package.author: Nils Melchert (Leibniz University Hannover)
package.maintainer: G.A. vd. Hoorn (TU Delft Robotics Institute)
